yo: Yo voy al gimnasio cada mañana.
I go to the gym every morning.
Yo quiero aprender a tocar la guitarra.
I want to learn to play the guitar.
tú: Tú vas a la escuela todos los días.
You go to school every day.
You live in this city, right?
You know a lot about technology.
él: Él juega al fútbol los fines de semana.
He plays soccer on the weekends.
Is he going to the cinema with you?
He doesn't know how to swim.
ella: Is she going to the party?
Ella vive en el centro de la ciudad.
She lives in the city center.
Ella trabaja en una tienda de ropa.
She works in a clothing store.
nosotros/as: Nosotros somos amigos desde la infancia.
We have been friends since childhood.
Nosotros vamos de vacaciones a la playa.
We are going on vacation to the beach.
Nosotros comemos juntos todos los días.
Nosotros estudiamos en la misma universidad.
We study at the same university.
Nosotros jugamos al baloncesto los sábados.
vosotros/as: Vosotros vais a la fiesta esta noche.
You all are going to the party tonight.
Do you all have homework for tomorrow?
Vosotros vivís en una casa grande.
You all live in a big house.
You all eat a lot of pizza.
Do you all study in the same class?
ellos/as: Ellos trabajan en una empresa de tecnología.
They work at a tech company.
Ellos estudian juntos para los exámenes.
Ellos viajan por todo el mundo.
They travel all over the world.
Ellos tienen una mascota muy cariñosa.
They have a very affectionate pet.
usted: Do you know where the station is?
Usted tiene una cita importante hoy.
You have an important appointment today.
You work at the hospital, right?
ustedes: You all have been working a lot.
You all need to arrive early.
Ustedes viven en una ciudad bonita.
You all live in a beautiful city.
You all speak Spanish very well.
